meta.name: Garian
meta.about:
Based in Hong Kong, since 2017 GARIAN aims to cultivate a field
that allows creativity to stretch, assure imagination to inhabit.

We believe that life objects are not just necessities,
but pieces that assemble the sense of belongings.
